description.@en: You call forth the most destructive of forces to rage over your foe, whether it be a lightning strike, trees lashing about, an open maw in the earth, a pounding ice storm, a rising tide of acidic water or a fiery tornado.

data.distance: Any one person you can see

criticalFailure.@en: The call of the wild goes unanswered. You are petrified into a soft stone and left Helpless for 72 hours.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe also suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril now and every Turn thereafter until they are Incapacitated! from it.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, one foe immediately suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage now and every Turn thereafter until they are Slain! from it.

reagents.@en: The petrified penis of a Troll, held aloft
